Is there somewhere else i can download it?

Just a note to the several tens of thousands of people who've downloaded this contract pack :

With KSP 1.1 , this pack will be undergoing fundamental structural changes and downsizing. I've gotten wind that the stock contract progression in 1.1 is going to draw even more heavily from the ideas in this pack than 1.02 did when Squad first expanded the stock progression contracts. As a result, this pack is being re-designed to avoid duplicate contracts and overlapping objectives. I've already started this work, and have expanded the types of contracts included (still in testing) to include unmanned missile tests, more Sun/Kerbol related contracts, rovers, and a few other things. I'm also changing the prerequisites for the contracts so that they are objective/progression based instead of simply relying on earlier contracts having been completed. For example, they will require 500 science has been earned, or the player has escaped Kerbin's SOI, before being offered.

This is being done in conjunction with my Soviet and NASA career mode overhaul mods (in my sig), but there will be a stand-alone release without the Sov/US "themes".  

When released post 1.1 , the pack will be re-named to "Additional Progression Contracts" and I'll be starting a new forum thread (and linking to it here).
I had a send 2 Kerbals to orbit mission, but when I launched my space station the contract got assigned to it and it won't recognize new launches, so is asking me to launch my space station.

[@tjsnh](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/108021-tjsnh/)

[@tjsnh](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/108021-tjsnh/)

Is this supposed to be a bug or not:

For example, i finished a contract to send 2 kerbals in orbit. now, i get that same contract . i really like this mod pack but its really annoying.

Sounds like a bug, normally you should only get 1 at a time.  

I'll double check that all contracts are flagged correctly for that for the next release (which I'm testing out now with the 1.1 prerelease)

I think it may not be a bug. In the text docs i noticed that, for example the first mun landing has a line that says "*maxcompletions=1"*  while, lets say get 2 kerbals into orbit doesnt have that line. I would recommend changing the ingame title to something like "*Routine two-kerbal orbit".*

*I* presume that this is to encourage multiple missions of the same type.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-04-04T11:52:03Z" title="04/04/2016 11:52  AM" data-short="8 yr">April 4, 2016</time> by Markush100**

> *I* presume that this is to encourage multiple missions of the same type.

Some of the contracts may be completed multiple times, and that is intentional - it's to give some reward/motivation for "routine" spaceflights so they aren't a pure drain on funds.  

However you shouldn't be able to get the same contract more than once *at the same time*.

no, i didnt get them at the same time. I now understand that they are supposed to be routine. a great addition.

sorry for the misunderstanding.

Sorry for the delays getting the new version out - been swamped at my dayjob.  

Should be this week.
If you need a tester, I'm glad to ruin my save files for you. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

Oh, and if you need someone to scrounge through config files to fix some minor bugs, I may be able to help.  I'm still learning though, and I'm sort of stressed from a family emergency right now so I can't reliably work on anything.  (Probably going to be at least a few more months.)  

Update: the family emergency is about as resolved as it will be for now.  (My Father in Law has late stage liver disease).  I can certainly help with config file editing if you get a list of changes needed up on GitHub I can get started.  However, I can't guarantee that there won't be any interruptions in my work.  

**Edited <time datetime="2016-06-27T22:15:26Z" title="06/27/2016 10:15  PM" data-short="8 yr">June 27, 2016</time> by Ruedii**
  
Update.

Just a heads up - this project isn't dead. I've just been swamped at work.  

Hopefully I'll get the next version released soon, it's about 90% ready.

As an FYI - the new version is complete.  

It depends on the new version of contract configurator which is coming out later this week, so I'll be posting a link to the download as soon as the updated CC is posted.  

What to expect:

- Number of contracts significantly reduced to remove duplicates that were merged into the Squad/Stock "world firsts" progression system.
- Contracts reworked, many bugs resolved, "new ways of scripting it better" used.
- Project renamed - will be starting a new forum thread, and posting the link to it here.

Replacement mod is published  
  
[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/144401-additional-progression-contracts-10-72316/](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/144401-additional-progression-contracts-10-72316/)
